thread.section_title: GigSalad Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GigSalad | www.gigsalad.com
thread.title: Ginger Barrientez, CMP, Director of Marketing
thread.title_full: GigSalad reviewed by Ginger Barrientez, CMP, Director of Marketing

author: Ginger Barrientez, CMP, Director of Marketing
title: Ginger Barrientez, CMP, Director of Marketing
text:
Place your bets and come out a WINNER with "Marilyn Monroe Tribute by Janet"! Not only was she on point as a lookalike, she was also in full character with her voice, body language and sound bytes. She exceeded our expectations by interacting with attendees to draw them to our booth space and encouraged attendees to get more involved using the props we had for our impromptu photo booth.
She was also timely and proactive in asking lots of questions to fully understand our needs at the event and her role to achieve them.
I can't say enough positive things about her other than YOU JUST HAVE TO BE LUCKY ENOUGH IF SHE'S AVAILABLE FOR YOUR NEXT GIG!
